featured.text: The townspeople built a _____ in memory of the brave teacher who sacrificed her life to save her students from a burning bus.
The glory lies not in the achievement but in the sacrifice.

definition.zh_def: 犧牲，指為了某種目的而放棄自己的利益或生命。
definition.en_def: To give up something valuable for the sake of something else.
definition.example: She made a sacrifice to ensure her children's education.
